messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] I need help.
messages.msgSnippet: ... Only in crappy Hollywood movies. Sorry. Tony
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 26, 2007, at 12:51 AM, Craig wrote:

> Hey guys,
>
> I need help on something important, its for a short movie im making...
> I was wondering if any of you could help me out.
>
> My story involves two boys undertaking lessons from a sensei near
> Kyoto, what i need to know is was there any sort of trial or test to
> see which one learned more than the other and claim his sword when he
> passed?
>
Only in crappy Hollywood movies.

Sorry.


Tony

messages.subject: I need help.
messages.msgSnippet: Hey guys, I need help on something important, its for a short movie im making... I was wondering if any of you could help me out. My story involves two boys
messages.messageBody:
Hey guys,

I need help on something important, its for a short movie im making...
I was wondering if any of you could help me out.

My story involves two boys undertaking lessons from a sensei near
Kyoto, what i need to know is was there any sort of trial or test to
see which one learned more than the other and claim his sword when he
passed?
